SensitivityClassification.summary: Provides the functionlity to retrieve Sensitivity Classification data as received from SQL Server for the active 'SqlDataReader'

ColumnSensitivities.summary: Returns the column sensitivity for this 'SensitivityClassification' Object

InformationTypes.summary: Returns the information types collection for this 'SensitivityClassification' Object

Labels.summary: Returns the labels collection for this 'SensitivityClassification' Object

ctor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
